name: Lil Adventures
description:
Lil Adventures is a tricky 2D platform game with many surprises and unexpected traps. It is inspired by Trap adventure 2, the player will face different stages where not only skill moving the character will be necessary to survive the levels and get the best score possible.

This is an early release, it is expected to keep on development, creating more levels, replacing free assets and including a catchy music and decent quality sounds.
